author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Mahila Court on Wednesday issued a witness warrant to a doctor for not responding to the sixth summons to appear as evidence in a case pertaining to molestation and impregnation of a 30-year-old deaf and dumb woman by a 50-year-old man.

According to the warrant issued by the judge Thirunavakarasu, the doctor Vaishnavi must be produced on March 9, 2016.

The accused Srirangan (50) of Chennapatti village had developed intimacy with the woman Poovayi (30) with the promise of marrying her during 2009, but abandoned her after she gave birth to a male child.
title: Warrant against doctor
